text: Ashley Green (born 6 April 1973) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with the Brisbane Bears in the Australian Football League (AFL). Green was initially a 1989 VFL Draftee, chosen by Essendon with the 19th selection. He only played reserves during his time at Essendon and went to Brisbane after the Bears elected to use the first pick of the 1992 Pre-Season Draft on him. A utility, he was a regular member of the Brisbane side in 1992 with 18 appearances but played only five times in 1993.AFL Tables: Ashley Green In late 2012, he was appointed the Senior coach of the Gippsland Football League's Warragul Football Club. This was his second stint coaching the club.Warragul Football & Netball Club News Article ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Brisbane Bears players Category:Warragul Football Club players Category:Living people
title: Ashley Green (footballer)
